title: Tuesday Post Show (09-21-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (09-21-21)
description:
Bobby talks about why the new Sam Adams beer is illegal in 15 states. He talks about a cool gift he got from his friend Charlamagne tha God with alcohol. We also talk about the Emmy ratings being up, the deadliest animals in North American and how Alicia Silverstone has joined Bumble. We also try out a new game and play a round of 20 questions to try and figure out a famous person.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
